K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-1: da yam n'a ma dha ra ni /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-3: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-7: bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi skyed mos tshal
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-8: na sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi shing ljon pa
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-9: kun nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-10: lha'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-12: dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-14: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shing dang bshad do //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i dus na /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-18: kun tu rjes su gzung ba dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-19: khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-21: chos thams cad dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-22: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-23: rnams rnam pa thams cad du khyad par thob par
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-24: bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-25: ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-27: de khyed kyis zungs la da ltar dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13a-28: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-0: dus na theg pa chen po la yang @13b dag
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-1: par zhugs pa'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi rnams la ston
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-3: yal bar mi dor bar nges par bstan par bya /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-5: ji tsam du phongs par gyur pa rnams dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-6: sgrib pa dang ldan pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bskyang zhing nges par bstan par bya /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin 'di nan tan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-15: sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-19: sarba a'a k'a ra aartha pa ri pr'apte /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-20: aa sa manta sarba ku na a'a k'a re trya dhve /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-21: aa sam ga aa n'a pri ti /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-22: sa manta da sha de sha /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-24: sarba aa sam ga darsha na pr'apte /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-25: sarba dharma ma bi sha ta pa ri p'urne /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-27: aa sam ga sa ma ni te /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-28: sa mant'a aa th'a ti ha ta dzetrya dhva da sha su /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-34: bi mo ksha aa nu pr'apte /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-35: su pra ti buddha dha rm'a dh'a tu /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-36: aa tyanta su ni sri te /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-37: sarba a'a k'a ra ni sa sa r'a na /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-38: aa na pa she sha p'a rang te /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-40: aa sam yo ga bi pra yo ga sthi te dharma te /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-42: pra kri ti pa ri shuddha /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:13b-45: trya dhva aa nu ga ta /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-0: ma dhya trya dhva sa manta aa @14a *//
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-3: pa ri dzny'a pra ha na /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-5: sa ksh'ad kri ya par ma pa rang+ga te /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-6: ya th'a b'a di ta th'a k'a ri /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-7: sarba a'a k'a ra sam panne /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-8: sarba a'a k'a ra ma h'a /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-9: mee tri mah'a ka ru n'a /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-10: srba a'a k'a r'a sa mas gra ha aa nu pr'apte /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-12: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs te /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-13: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor bzhi po las rigs kyi bu'am /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-14: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-15: legs par kha ton du byas te 'dzin pa des dman pa'i sems su mi bya ste /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du de
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-17: dag gi spyi gtsug gi steng gi mtshams su gnas
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-18: par 'gyur ro // kha cig ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-20: kha cig ni chos ston par 'gyur /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-21: kha cig ni gzungs mi brjed par 'gyur /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-22: slob pa lam la gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-23: rgyun mi 'chad cing chos ston pa rgyun mi chad
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-24: par 'gyur / kun tu 'dzin pa mi brjed par yang 'gyur /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-25: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grub par 'gyur /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-26: de dag dang ldan na thos pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs thob par 'gyur /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-27: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-28: ba nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14a-30: yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du rjes su thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-0: @14b khyed kyis tshe 'di la nga'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-2: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bya zhing bsgrag par bya'o //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-8: de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-10: sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slad ma'i dus na 'khor
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-12: bzhi rnams la phyi bshol ma mchis pa dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-13: mi bskyud par bstan par bgyi /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-16: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bgyi zhing bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-17: des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dang mthun par 'gyur /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-18: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung par 'gyur /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-20: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang don chen po dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-21: phan pa'i dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-24: de'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin gyis shig /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-25: 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o //
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-28: dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:14b-29: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:15a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la @15a *//
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:15a-2: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:15a-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang /
K12D0515=D0855_H0487:15a-5: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
